title: ALL THE COOLING!! - Silverstone @ Computex 2023
description: Print products with your own designs! Visit VistaPrint at   Silverstone is here at Computex with a heavy focus on airflow! From crazy expandable cases taking new unique angles, AIOs with stackable VRAM fans, and even new server cases for the IT crowd. Will Alex be blown away by what Silverstone has to offer?  Buy a SilverStone ALTA F2 Super Tower Chassis:  Buy a SilverStone RM44 Server Chassis:  Buy a SilverStone RM51 Server Chassis:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Your PC needs air! 0:11 ALTA F2 2:05 Sponsor - VistaPrint 2:29 New server cases and the ALTA D1 4:42 Gemini 900A Gold Dual Power Supply 5:01 New AIOs and stackable VRAM fans 6:01 Outro
